description:
These boots offer a welcome combination of hiking support and climbing nimbleness. The to-the-toe lacing can be eased off for comfortable walking on the approach or snugged up for precision when edging or toeing in on steeper terrain. Waterproof-breathable construction makes them great for wet trails and descending snow-filled gullies.

  • Uppers are 1.6mm suede leather with GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort waterproof-breathable construction
  • Full rubber rand adds durability
  • Cleansport NXT organic natural odour control
  • Lacing right down to the toes for a precise fit
  • Salewa 3F System connects the instep with the sole and heel for a supportive, flexible fit
  • Insoles are mid-stiff nylon
  • Multi-Fit footbeds have customizable layers at the forefoot by to accommodate a range of foot shapes and sizes
  • Outsoles are Vibram® WTC 2 for traction, secure footing and firm support
name: Salewa Mountain Trainer 2 Mid Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
